banner.title: SMGH Academy
banner.description: Our in-house Learning & Development department, dedicated to empowering staff through continuous training and growth.

programs.title: Ongoing Training
programs.description: Regularly scheduled training sessions ensure staff stay updated with the latest medical standards, safety protocols, and professional practices. These programs encourage continuous learning and adaptation to evolving healthcare needs.
